Title: An Act Changing the Name of Pasong Putik Elementary School Located at St. Dominic Subdivision, Barangay Kaligayahan, Quezon City, Metropolitan Manila, to Delfin Geraldez Memorial Elementary School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 775
An Act Changing the Name of Pasong Putik Elementary School Located at St. Dominic Subdivision, Barangay Kaligayahan, Quezon City, Metropolitan Manila, to Delfin Geraldez Memorial Elementary School
Section 1. Pasong Putik Elementary School located at St. Dominic Subdivision, Barangay Kaligayahan, Quezon City, Metropolitan Manila, is hereby named Delfin Geraldez Memorial Elementary School in honor of the late Delfin Geraldez, a philanthropist who donated the lot where the school is now located.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 13, 1984

The Lawphil Project - Arellano Law Foundation
